summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 51st Street, from connection with existing sewer on Ravenna Avenue to alley in Block 14, Ravenna Springs Park Supplemental Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7065 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
